::Grounded::
"no one is attacking" he replied to windlord, "i just had to keep 
Trinity busy."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "What?"said Nightlight while she opened her commlink ans spoke "Are 
> someone attacking the base??? Are Trinity Ok? Where's she???"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >     He received the com from Grounded.  "There should be some 
> shields that 
> > are ready.  The guns were your department if you ever got to 
them."
